text: daoy puokke smaohtrang champoh a l laoh temuoyokt min men chea puok shi ri k nung trong laey . haey anaknea del thveu shi ri k nung a l laoh noh ku hakbeidauchchea ke ban thleak pileu mekh haey trauv satvasleab( sahav) muoy ban chhk yk ke ryyka trauv khyalpyouh bk kuoch yk ke tow thleak kanleng muoy da chhngay
